body: Since the dependencies were different between the [homepage}(https://pierreablin.github.io/picard/#dependencies), [`setup.py`](https://github.com/pierreablin/picard/blob/maint/0.6/setup.py#L65) and [`requirements.txt`](https://github.com/pierreablin/picard/blob/maint/0.6/requirements.txt), I took the once from `requirements.txt`.
title: py-python-picard: add new package
